sentences.english: He's my patient, " she said bluntly ."
sentences.chinese: “他是我的病人，”她毫不客氣的說。

sentences.english: I tried to speak to james but he just gave me the brush-off .

這個請求被毫不客氣地拒絕了。

sentences.english: The guests were rather free and easy with theirs host' s liquor.

sentences.english: A few bruiser, even to an irreverent hit Bai Zhou.
